name: SensorFleet capture engine
title: SensorFleet capture engine
description: Capture Engine redistributes packets from physical interface to mirror-bridge interface(s).
data_retention_desc: Capture Engine does not store information

required_interfaces.description: The physical interface whose data is to be copied
Interface(s) where to mirror the data from physical interface

performance_desc: Capture Engine should be able to mirror gigabits/sec of traffic with F-Probe hardware
